It also identifies areas of support for each athlete and works with all stakeholders in the process of aiding the deserving talent."}]}]]}],["$","$L10",null,{"children":[["$","$L11",null,{"expandIcon":["$","$L12",null,{"icon":"ep:arrow-down"}],"aria-controls":"panel2-content","id":"panel2-header","children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"What are the organisational capabilities of Olympic Gold Quest?"}]}],["$","$L13",null,{"children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"Renowned sporting icons provide the vision and road-map to structure the support system for our athletes. Business leaders to provide monitoring and enable corporate participation.A full-fledged research team to identify potential talent, training needs and support requirements. OGQ has supported the training of more than 100 athletes since inception."}]}]]}],["$","$L10",null,{"children":[["$","$L11",null,{"expandIcon":["$","$L12",null,{"icon":"ep:arrow-down"}],"aria-controls":"panel2-content","id":"panel2-header","children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"Who are the members of the Foundation?"}]}],["$","$L13",null,{"children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"The executive committee includes: - Geet Sethi: 8 times World Billiards Champion, Padma Shri and Khel Ratna Awardee - Prakash Padukone: All England Badminton Champion, Padma Shri, Arjuna Awardee - Niraj Bajaj: 4 time National Table Tennis Champion, Arjuna Awardee and Director, Bajaj group of Companies - Viswanathan Anand: 5 time World Chess Champion, Padma Vibhushan, Khel Ratna Awardee - Leander Paes: 14 time Grand Slam Champion, Olympic Bronze Medalist, Padma Bhushan, Khel Ratna Awardee - R. Ramaraj: Senior Advisor, Sequoia Capital - Shitin Desai: Founder Directore, DSP Merrill Lynch (since retired) - Rakesh Khanna: Founding Partner, Ambit RSM (since retired) - Neeraj Bharadwaj: Managing Director, The Carlyle Group - Deepika Padukone: Acclaimed Actor - Viren Rasquinha: Former Indian Hockey Captain, Olympian & Arjuna Awardee is the Chief Executive Officer of the foundation"}]}]]}],["$","$L10",null,{"children":[["$","$L11",null,{"expandIcon":["$","$L12",null,{"icon":"ep:arrow-down"}],"aria-controls":"panel2-content","id":"panel2-header","children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"What is India’s Olympic Gold Medal tally?"}]}],["$","$L13",null,{"children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"India has won 9 Olympic Gold Medals. 8 of these medals have been in Hockey and Abhinav Bindra’s Gold in Shooting at Beijing Olympics 2008 was India’s first Individual Olympic Gold."}]}]]}],["$","$L10",null,{"children":[["$","$L11",null,{"expandIcon":["$","$L12",null,{"icon":"ep:arrow-down"}],"aria-controls":"panel2-content","id":"panel2-header","children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"What is the need for private initiatives like Olympic Gold Quest?"}]}],["$","$L13",null,{"children":["$","$La",null,{"children":"Despite being a country of over a billion, India has won only ONE individual Gold Medal at the Olympics.
